reviews.review_msg: I took Ling 410 with her and I felt kind of intimidated because it is a 400 level course but Suzanne is so approachable that it turned out to be my favorite linguistics class.The class is discussion based where everyone is encouraged to participate whether in class or online. Her marking scheme is very fair and she gives a lot of feedback. GREAT!

She is very insightful and her lectures are very interesting. The exams and assignments are quite difficult but any 400-level courses demand a lot of work. She is picky with attendance so make sure you make it to class. Also, her grading scale is quite high. 93 and up is an A.
